page.title: 11EASSIE ADULTS' PASTIMES
page.content: We asked many adults in our area what they did in their spare time. Apart from watching television and reading, which everyone seemed to enjoy, the following activities were mentioned most often. Many of the men supported Dundee United football team and went to team matches. Some adults used Forfar Leisure Centre to take part in badminton, squash etc..Ski-ing was popular at Glenshee, an hour's drive away and in the summer, camping, caravanning and gardening were mentioned. There were a few horse owners who enjoyed riding and entering competitions.Some ladies were members of Eassie W.R.I. and Woman's Guild and others helped with youth organisations.
